Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I am playing KSP for a while now, with several mods active. This morning I found a strange problem. After loading a saved game, also after starting a new game, the KSC isn't there - i can only see the heaven, the stars. Kerbin seems to be disappeared. Does anyone know what this could be?

Whitout the Tracking Station, I cannot control my flights, and also the Launch Pad / Runway is needed to start new flights. Construnction of new Ships and Planes also is impossible. So, the game is stopped at this point. What can I do? Has someone an idea?
Probably a planet mod, are you playing stock?

Probably a planet mod, are you playing stock?

I switched off several mods, and finally KSP is full functional at last. Nonetheless I had to start new, because some Parts I used are missing now. I am not using a planet mod... I tried, but I don`t know where I should put the maps. Thanks for the reply
